Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.LeaderCard

Class LeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.LeaderCard.LeaderCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
NewDiscount, NewProduction, NewShelf, NewWhiteMarble
public abstract class LeaderCard
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent the leader card

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    LeaderCard​(LeaderCardRequirements requirements, int victoryPoints, Resource resource)
    this constructor create a leader card from requirements, victory points and resource
    LeaderCard​(LeaderCardRequirements requirements, int victoryPoints, Resource resource, int id)
    this constructor is useful only for clients in order to recreate the card and associate him the png

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean activateCard​(RealPlayer toChange)
    this method activate the card if the player in input meets the requirements, do nothing otherwise this method is overrided
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
    this method verify if two leader cards are equals in particular, if they have the same requirements, victory points, and resource associated
    int getId()  
    LeaderCardRequirements getRequirements()
    this method get the requirements of the card
    Resource getResource()
    this method get the resource associated with tle leader card
    ThinLeaderCard getThin()
    this method convert the leader card to a thin card in order to send it into the network
    int getVictoryPoints()
    this method get the victory points of the leader card
    abstract java.lang.String identifier()
    USEFUL ONLY FOR CLIENTS this method returns the String that identifies the LeaderCard
    boolean isActive()
    this method verify if the card is active or not
    void setActive()
    this method set the attribute isActive to true it is called only in the method activeCard
    java.lang.String toString()
